TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColumnReorderedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置取消事件属性设置为`true`。The event can be canceled by setting the property to `true`. 但是，如果事件被取消时，不会更改为值。However, if the event is cancelled, the will not change to the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
